aka: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic "The Star of a Thousand Wishes"

cast.name: 黛比·德里贝里 Debi Derryberry
贾斯汀·迈克尔 Justin Michael
克里斯蒂娜·米利齐亚 Cristina Milizia

this_title: The Star of a Thousand Wishes
trans_title: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic "The Star of a Thousand Wishes"
introduction: Prepare for Care Bears: Unlock the Magic: The Star of a Thousand Wishes! Funshine and Good Luck Bear stumble upon a magical star that grants wishes. Initially, their wishes bring joy and excitement, but soon the situation spirals out of control, creating chaos in their world. The other Care Bears—Cheer Bear, Grumpy Bear, and Share Bear—step in to save the day. Through teamwork and the magic of their belly badges, they manage to restore order. This heartwarming adventure underscores the importance of friendship and caring, showing that these values are the true magic.[Cast]Debi Derryberry as Funshine BearJustin Michael as Grumpy BearCristina Milizia as Cheer BearBen Diskin as Grumpy Bear and Tenderheart BearMichael Sinterniklaas as BlusterStephanie Sheh as Share BearRyan-Aimée as Good Luck BearAlex Hall as Dibble and additional voicesHarry Chaskin as Bedtime Bear
chinese_title: The Star of a Thousand Wishes
